mean_cn: n. 习语，成语，惯用语法
mean_en: an expression that cannot be understood from the meanings of its separate words but that has a separate meaning of its own
word_etyma: idio特殊的，专有的+m→ 特殊的语言、专用的语言→惯用语，方言，习语，成语
short_phrase: idiom of raining cats and dogs
sentence: The idiom "raining cats and dogs" means "it's raining heavily".
sentence_trans: 习语“raining cats and dogs”意思“是下倾盆大雨"。
